item.title: By: Brembo GP Radial | GRAND MIGHTY
item.dc:creator: Brembo GP Radial | GRAND MIGHTY
item.description: [...] in effect, there are a few things I can take care of on the 600RR before the next season. After the last trackday, the brake feel turned into a sloppy mess. Upon inspection, there was a clicking sound as the lever [...]

item.title: By: Kent
item.dc:creator: Kent
item.description: Glad your Saturday went well dude. Can't say I'm as passionate as you are with bikes and what not but it'd definitely be sick to watch you get down on a track someday.
item.content:encoded: Glad your Saturday went well dude. Can’t say I’m as passionate as you are with bikes and what not but it’d definitely be sick to watch you get down on a track someday.
